attributes.action: shut down this waste of time website as every response from the government just states that they do not agree with the petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having taken part in many of these online petitions, mostly to do with road and policing, I have found consistently that the government response is to say they disagree and that everything is fine.  If that is the case then why have the petition in the first place if not just as a sop to the public to let them think we live in a democracy or that the government actually listens and cares about our opinion.
